abstract: Surely the bank’s chairman has some welcoming remarks for the American taxpayers, who will soon own the company.
snippet: Surely the bank’s chairman has some welcoming remarks for the American taxpayers, who will soon own the company.
lead_paragraph: The United States government will become the largest shareholder of Citigroup when it exchanges its preferred shares for common stock in coming weeks.

headline.main: What Citigroup Should Say to Us, Its Shareholders
